MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW10 postcode area of Middlewich affecting properties in Byley Lane and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to repair a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:12am on 23rd October 2020.
